headline: Dollar General Board Shift Puts Governance In Focus For Expansion Plans
summary: Dollar General (NYSE:DG) has appointed David P. Rowland as chairman of the board. A long serving director is planning to retire from the board, signaling an upcoming shift in governance. These leadership changes come as the company continues its expansion and operational initiatives. For investors watching Dollar General at a share price of $153.84, these boardroom moves arrive after a mixed performance profile. The stock is up 4.9% over the past week and 12.4% year to date, with a 116.7%...
